description: A trial attorney with experience as a Public Defender in Norfolk, VA. He handles felony and misdemeanor cases, including drug offenses, property crimes, and traffic offenses. He was recognized as the Public Practitioner of the Year by the South Hampton Roads Bar Association in 2020
